data.title: Contact

data.text:
PEF uses a software called Action Network to securely email members about a variety of topics. Communications may be wide-reaching, like a message from the president about a significant union victory, or they may be local, like an email from your Division council leader inviting you to an upcoming meeting. You can opt in or out of those emails, and update your email address, using this form.

The mailing address for PEF headquarters is:

MAIN OFFICE

Public Employees Federation

1168-70 Troy-Schenectady Road

P.O. Box 12414

Albany, N.Y. 12212-2414

Telephone: (800) 342-4306 | (518) 785-1900

The mailing address for PEF Membership Benefits is:
